title: Rajkot Oilseed Complex Close- September 26 ,2019.
text:
Rajkot Oilseed Complex Close- September 26 ,2019.

Commodities 1 hour ago (Sep 26, 2019 20:10)

Rajkot Oilseed Complex Close- September 26 ,2019. Rajkot Oilseed Complex Close-September 26 1 1. Groundnut oil prices eased due to restricted demand from retailers. 2. Castor oil dropped further due to supply pressure. 3. Cottonseed oil firmed up due to retail demand.
